title: Average ticket price Miami Heat ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This graph depicts the Average ticket price for Miami Heat games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 .
In the 2006/07 season , the Average ticket price was 78.3 U.S. dollars .
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Miami Heat games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16.
In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 56.55 U.S. dollars.

Miami Heat - additional information The Miami Heat are an American professional basketball team playing in the National Basketball Association 's ( NBA ) Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference .
